item.title: Who is Mark Carney? New Canadian PM’s family, career, and more
item.description: Mark Carney met his English wife Diana when they were both members of the Oxford University Ice Hockey Club.

item.title: Chicken lays anus clenchingly massive egg
item.description: The whopper took five hours to deliver

item.title: The unusual psychic technique used by the MoD to try and find Osama bin Laden
item.description: 'It was a classic low probability high consequence situation, in that even if people were skeptical, the impact of any successes would be huge.'

item.title: This is why an entire town plays a brutal 16-hour football game on Shrove Tuesday
item.description: Shrovetide ball games have been played in England since Henry II was on the throne.

item.title: Former CIA agent claims there was life on Mars and he saw ‘bones’ on the surface
item.description: 'It [was] obvious these people were dying for some reason, but they were humans. They were just twice our size.'
